articles.description: 'Sam Bahadur' will hit theatres on December 1. At the film's trailer launch in Delhi recently, Vicky Kaushal performed drills with 6 Sikh Regiment.
articles.content: Sam Bahadur, starring Vicky Kaushal in the lead, is set for release on December 1, 2023. The film is based on the life of Field Marshal Sam Manekshaw. Directed by Meghna Gulzar, the film also stars S… [+2308 chars]
